reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater comfortable, well-made, and appreciate its nice quality fabric with a ribbed texture. They like its appearance and consider it good value for money, with one customer noting it doesn't lose its shape. The fit receives mixed feedback, with some finding it accurate while others say it runs small.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I’m in love with these shirts!
items.body: I absolutely love these shirts. I love the fit and how it feels against my skin. Great layering item. I’m 5 7’ 118 pounds, 34 B chest, and got the small size. I like the fit. If you prefer a loser fitted shirt this might not be the shirt for you. Size up if you don’t like the more fitted look. This shirt does not wear like a sweater. It has some stretch to it. It’s more like a cotton ribbed knit. I’ve ordered these shirts in every color as they go on sale. I’m able to push the sleeves up no problem. It’s a great addition to my wardrobe. I just love these shirts. Read more
items.author: T. R. Reagan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars If you're looking for a comfortable, stylish, and affordable sweater option.
items.body: I recently picked up the **Amazon Essentials Women's Slim-Fit Rib Scoop Neck Rib Sweater** in a pack of two, and I am absolutely loving them! The fit is just right—it's slim without being too tight, which makes it super flattering. I appreciate that it’s available in plus sizes, ensuring a great fit for everyone. The ribbed texture adds a nice touch, making it feel a bit more stylish than your average sweater. I got the pack in two colors, and they are perfect for layering or wearing on their own. They’re versatile enough to dress up for work or keep it casual for a day out. What I really love is how soft and comfortable the fabric is. It feels cozy against the skin, and I can wear it all day without any discomfort. Plus, they wash well and maintain their shape, which is always a bonus! If you're looking for a comfortable, stylish, and affordable sweater option, I highly recommend the **Amazon Essentials Rib Scoop Neck Sweater**. It’s a fantastic addition to my wardrobe! Read more
items.author: josias

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Ordered Up 2 Sizes for a More Relaxed Fit, But Didn't Work
items.body: I guess I didn't understand completely what slim fit means. According to the sizing chart, I wear a medium. But since it was a slim fit I ordered an extra large for a more relaxed fit. That has worked for me with the Amazon Essentials brand before. It did not work this time. This shirt is just skin tight and stretchy. It fits like an old tube top. The material is thick and not see through. I liked the quality of the fabric, colors and neckline. I just like more relaxed shirts than this one. Read more
items.author: Jaunts

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and comfy!
items.body: These are super soft and fit nicely. Perfect for dressing up or casual wear. Very pleased with this purchase! Read more
items.author: Maria McGowan

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars NOT a sweater
items.body: NOT a sweater in any sense- at least in my definition. They fabric is a nice medium weight with fine vertical ribbing but reminds me more of a good quality Henley. They do feel soft, fit nice but I was looking for a sweater.. would have returned but I got 2 for $10 so I kept them. Read more
items.author: cheryl

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars On the smaller end of true size
items.body: Stretchy fabric. Very form fitting. On the smaller end of my size range - may want to size up Read more
items.author: Amanda

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice shirts
items.body: This is my second purchase of these shirts there are thick they are worth the $7.49 buy it while you can I bought the first pier and then I said hey let me touch this while it's still on sale and bought another pair it will keep you warm in the winter Read more
items.author: Tina

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Runs very small
items.body: These are cute and love the neckline--however, they fit very tightly. I always wear a small and even a small is usually too big. Based on reviews I ordered a medium in this item and it is still too tight. Have reordered in a large--hopefully they will fit, better. I would order two sizes up to make sure the top fits. I am 5' 4' and weigh 90 lbs, by the way--can't even imagine how tight this top would be if I had ordered my usual size small. Note: this is a stretchy long sleeved T and NOT a sweater. Read more
items.author: Private

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Lilac/White, White, Black/Charcoal Heather, Black/Eggshell White, Eggshell White/Espresso, Navy/White, Black, Grey/White. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
